div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:35 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 39. North wind 10 to 15 mph becoming light and variable in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 79. Breezy, with a light south southwest wind becoming south 15 to 20 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
